pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.10: “Ime, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū amhākaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.11: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.12: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.13: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.16: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhūnaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:1.19: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya—‘itissa muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī’ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.1.10: “ūnavīsativasso maññe tvaṃ upasampanno, vikāle maññe tayā bhuttaṃ, majjaṃ maññe tayā pītaṃ, mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe tayā nisinnan”ti kukkuccaṃ upadahati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.1.12: na añño koci paccayo hoti kukkuccaṃ upadahituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.2.4: Anupasampannassa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc77:2.3.2: na kukkuccaṃ upadahitukāmo “ūnavīsativasso maññe tvaṃ upasampanno, vikāle maññe tayā bhuttaṃ, majjaṃ maññe tayā pītaṃ, mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe tayā nisinnaṃ, iṅgha jānāhi, mā te pacchā kukkuccaṃ ahosī”ti bhaṇati,
